response.original_title: 放送禁止VTR！ 恐怖心霊スポット
response.overview: This is a compilation of a horror series in which the crew visits a scary spot where urban legends and bad rumors are whispered to find out the truth behind the rumors. The team dares to do things that are considered “not good to do” to see what happens. The team visits a house where an elderly couple hanged themselves, an abandoned train station where a woman's spirit is rumored to live, and more.
response.title: Broadcast Prohibited VTR! Terrifying Ghost Spots
